title: E361 Mark Normand
itunes:title: Mark Normand
description:
Mark Normand is an American comedian from New Orleans, LA. Theo talks with Mark about growing up in Louisiana, the NYC comedy scene, and the power of having Jerry Seinfeld's phone number.
